xp-desc: *How much you've talked since you've been here, unlocks new roles*
warning-desc: *How many times you've been warned by moderation*
tooltip.maintenance.title: Weekly maintenance
tooltip.maintenance.description: Ankama updates the game's servers to make sure they are working properly and to avoid unforeseen events.
tooltip.maintenance.footer: It is also at this time that the migrations are carried out.
tooltip.maintenance.field1.title: âŒ› Duration
tooltip.maintenance.field2.title: ðŸ“… Frequency
tooltip.maintenance.field3.title: ðŸ“¢ End announce
tooltip.monomulti.main.title: Monoaccount vs Multiaccount
tooltip.monomulti.main.description: In Dofus, there are 2 ways to play the game, the 2 have their + and -, there is not really a better one than the other, it depends on the personal preferences of each.
tooltip.monomulti.multi.title: Multiaccount
tooltip.monomulti.multi.description: Play with several accounts at the same time connected on the same server. You have to open the game as many times as you have characters.
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field1.title: + Playing alone
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field1: No need to recruit people to build up a team
tooltip.monomulti.multi.fieldX.title: + Chosen composition
tooltip.monomulti.multi.fieldX: By choosing the classes in advance, we are sure to have a good team adapted to our needs
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field2.title: - Multiples subscriptions
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field2: You must sub all your account
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field3.title: - Not ergonomic
tooltip.monomulti.multi.field3: You must constantly repeat your actions on all your characters
tooltip.monomulti.multi.author: Several account, one char by account
tooltip.monomulti.mono.title: Monoaccount
tooltip.monomulti.mono.description: Playing with only one account at a time is usually the most popular for new players. Ilyzaelle and Jahash are two so-called "Single Account" servers, which means that people cannot play with multiple accounts on them.
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field1.title: - You must recruit
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field1: If you need help for a fight or a dungeon, you must find peoples to team with
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field2.title: + More social
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field2: But, it helps socializing and sharing good moments
tooltip.monomulti.mono.fieldX.title: + Ilyzaelle
tooltip.monomulti.mono.fieldX: Ilyzaelle is the best server of the game, community-wide. It is a pleasure to play on it
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field3.title: - You must be sub
tooltip.monomulti.mono.field3: Monoaccount server are restricted to subbed account
tooltip.monomulti.mono.author: One char at a time
